item.title: [HIVE-28817] Rebuilding a materialized view stored in Iceberg fails when schema has varchar column
item.description:
Repro

set hive.explain.user=false;
set hive.support.concurrency=true;
set hive.txn.manager=org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.lockmgr.DbTxnManager;
set iceberg.mr.schema.auto.conversion=true;

create table basetable_rebuild (a int, b varchar(256))  stored as orc TBLPROPERTIES ('transactional'='true');

insert into basetable_rebuild values (1, 'alfred');

create materialized view mv_rebuild stored by iceberg as select a, b, sum(a) from basetable_rebuild group by a,b;

insert into basetable_rebuild values (4, 'amia');

alter materialized view mv_rebuild rebuild;
